options.sparql.val: SELECT (?Person AS ?Wiki_URL) (?PersonLabel AS ?Name) (?PlaceOfBirthLabel AS ?BirthPlace) ?BirthDate WHERE { ?Person wdt:P69 wd:Q160302 . ?Person wdt:P21 wd:Q6581072 . ?Person wdt:P19 ?PlaceOfBirth . ?BirthPlace wdt:P625 ?Coordinates . ?Person wdt:P569 ?BirthDate . SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language 'en' . }}
